name: Air Freight
description: Specialized logistics services for transporting goods by air, including cargo handling, customs clearance, and door-to-door delivery.

name: Land Freight
description: Ground transportation services for moving goods by truck, rail, or intermodal, including less-than-truckload, truckload, and refrigerated cargo.

name: Sea Freight
description: Ocean transportation services for shipping goods by container, bulk, or breakbulk, including port-to-port and door-to-door delivery.

name: Warehousing and Distribution
description: Storage and inventory management services for goods, including order fulfillment, packaging, and shipping.

name: Third-Party Logistics (3PL)
description: Outsourced logistics services that manage transportation, warehousing, and distribution for companies, providing a single point of contact.

name: Fourth-Party Logistics (4PL)
description: Advanced logistics services that integrate multiple 3PL providers, offering a comprehensive, end-to-end supply chain solution.

name: Freight Forwarding
description: Specialized services for arranging and coordinating transportation, including customs clearance, insurance, and documentation.

name: Customs Brokerage
description: Expert services for navigating complex customs regulations, including tariff classification, compliance, and duty payment.

name: Supply Chain Visibility
description: Technology-enabled services providing real-time tracking, monitoring, and analytics for goods in transit, improving supply chain transparency and efficiency.

name: Transportation Management
description: Software and services for optimizing transportation operations, including route planning, load optimization, and carrier management.

name: Inventory Management
description: Systems and services for tracking, managing, and optimizing inventory levels, including forecasting, replenishment, and order fulfillment.

name: Reverse Logistics
description: Specialized services for managing product returns, including inspection, refurbishment, and resale or disposal.

name: Intermodal Transportation
description: Services that combine multiple modes of transportation, such as truck, rail, and sea, to provide efficient and cost-effective door-to-door delivery.

name: Refrigerated Logistics
description: Specialized services for transporting temperature-sensitive goods, including cold chain management and refrigerated warehousing.

name: Project Logistics
description: Customized services for managing complex, large-scale projects, including heavy-lift, oversized, and high-value cargo transportation.

name: Automotive Logistics
description: Specialized services for the automotive industry, including vehicle transportation, warehousing, and distribution.

name: Aerospace Logistics
description: Highly specialized services for the aerospace industry, including transportation, warehousing, and distribution of sensitive and high-value components.

name: Chemical Logistics
description: Specialized services for transporting and storing hazardous and non-hazardous chemicals, including compliance with regulatory requirements.

name: Food and Beverage Logistics
description: Services tailored to the food and beverage industry, including temperature-controlled transportation, warehousing, and distribution.

name: Pharmaceutical Logistics
description: Highly specialized services for transporting and storing pharmaceutical products, including cold chain management and regulatory compliance.
